snippet: With the field gunning to stop his bid for a Triple Crown, I’ll Have Another will race in the Belmont Stakes from what his trainer calls the perfect position.
lead_paragraph: With the field gunning to stop his bid for a Triple Crown, I’ll Have Another will race in the Belmont Stakes from what his trainer calls the perfect position.

headline.seo: I’ll Have Another to Start Belmont Stakes From Post No. 11
headline.main: I’ll Have Another to Start From Post No. 11
headline.print_headline: I’ll Have Another to Start Belmont Stakes From Post No. 11
